title: Passage 1
name: Passage 1
description:
While the majority of student-activists regroup in the Student Center, two stay behind in order to examine the Main Building for possible entranceways. President Wethington has had the building locked down and guards posted throughout in preparation for student action. 

Finally, one student is able to prop a door open with a stick and quickly enter the building, moving to the basement and occupying a restroom stall.

He alerts the rest of the group. The sit-in is a go.
